Valve fixed a lot of things since my first review. 
Ranked matches really help against cheaters although now almost every player we play against has a new account with <500h and no medals. Idk where they all come from but they're alright and the matches are far more stable and less toxic.

Ótimo jogo, jogabilidade me lembra ao antigo cs, só tem alguns smurfs nas patentes baixas, mas é normal, nada que impeça você a subir de patente.
An entertaining, well-rounded game for players with systems of all specs as long as you're willing to overcome the rather steep learning curve and the almost caste-like system of ranking.

Охх,сколько лет,сколько зим я люблю эту серию игр. Я помню те сладкие моменты из 14 года. Эти....Карты,хитбоксы и прочее о чём вспомнит старый игрок.
---------
А что сейчас? Для меня это хорошая игра,правда только в компании друзей,но суть таковой и остаётся
---------
Весёлые Кооперативчики,Прятки,Хорроры. Всё это связывает меня и Нашего гостя 
---------
Отличная игра, ещё бы античит добавить нормальный. А так всё гуд :)

ESTO NO ES UN JUEGO, ES UN CAMPO DE ENTRENAMIENTO PARA HACKERS. SI INTENTAS TOMARTELO ENSERIO VAS A ACABAR POR DEJARLO O TE VERAS OBLIGADO A PAGAR FACE IT O ESEA.

The game itself is fun to play, albeit a lack of new maps in the competitive map pool is a problem and lack of actual new features and to the engine as well.
In matchmaking, it is just a coin flip if one is able to win or not. It depends all on the teammates one gets and there are a lot of Russian speaking players, that will just speak Russian in voice chat during a matchmaking game. In general, I found that toxic teammates or ones that are only trolling don't get punished and so the quality of matchmaking games remains low.

I can't recommend the game to others, because of the reasons mentioned above. Please work on this game Valve and make it better!

Bu kadar köklü, bu kadar epic bir oyunun halen hileye çözüm bulamamış olması gerçekten rezalet. Oyunu resmen salıverdiler istediğiniz kadar reportlayın asla ban yiyenine rastlamadım. Normalde oyunu kesinlikle tavsiye ederdim ama hile konusu çözülmedikçe bu oyunun sonu elbet gelecek.
